name: dbt-runner
label: DBT Runner
description: Run dbt (data build tool) projects on Flywheel datasets stored in external storage. Transforms source parquet files using user-defined dbt models and outputs results back to external storage
author: NACC

dbt_project_zip.description: Zip file containing a complete dbt project with dbt_project.yml, profiles.yml, models/, and other dbt files

storage_label.description: Label of the Flywheel external storage containing source and output data

output_prefix.description: Path prefix within external storage where transformed output tables will be written

output_filetypes.description: Comma-deliminated string of output file types; will write the set of results for each specified filetype

source_prefix.description: Path prefix within external storage where source Flywheel dataset files are located. If provided, will pull directly from this source.

target_project.description: Target project to aggregate source data from. If provided, will pull data from all centers with this project and aggregate before executing DBT.

include_centers.description: Comma separated list of centers to include in aggregation of target_project

exclude_centers.description: Comma separated list of centers to exclude from aggregation of target_project

exclude_studies.description: Comma separated list of study suffixes to exclude from aggregation of target_project

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey
